attributes.action: Adjust British Summer time, to create a boom to the economy and give us back our long summer nights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each year our Summer evenings seem to get shorter and shorter. That's because they have, in Aug 1987 it stayed light until 10.20pm. A natural change has occured only to find it's now getting lighter earlier. Unfortualty the UK government has not acted or even noticed!! With this time lost in the evening we could boost the economy by creating new jobs with bars and restaurants thriving, allowing shops to open later. Currently most of the UK public are sleeping through early morning day light. What a waste!
